course_name: Clinical Research Methods in Veterinary Science
description: A practical course designed to help post-graduate students enrolled in a residency training program (DVetClinSc), to develop skills in research techniques. It will equip students with an understanding of research design and the different research methodologies required to undertake the most common forms of research undertaken in conjunction with clinical residency training programs in veterinary science.
restricted: Enrolment restricted to DVetClinSc students only.
